SEARCH
Module ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.formats.csv
Package ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.formats.csv

Class AbstractLoadCSVMigration

java.lang.Object
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.formats.csv.AbstractLoadCSVMigration
All Implemented Interfaces:
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.JavaBasedMigration, ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.Migration
public abstract class AbstractLoadCSVMigration extends Object implements ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.JavaBasedMigration
This base class can be inherited inside applications that want to grab some data from a URI for example to trigger a LOAD CSV statement inside Neo4j. Migrations inheriting from it will always be repeatable (when adhering to the repeatable versioning scheme, such as R000__LoadBaseData.java) but also compute a CRC32 checksum from the source URI, so that the migration is only repeated when the source actually has changed.
Since:
2.0.1
Author:
Michael J. Simons

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractLoadCSVMigration

      protected AbstractLoadCSVMigration(URI csvSource, boolean repeatable)
      You need to call this constructor, but your implementation must have a default, no-arg constructor to be loadable like any other Java based migration.
      Parameters:
      csvSource - The source to load data from
      repeatable - Whether this is repeatable or not

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public final void apply(ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.MigrationContext context)
      Specified by:
      apply in interface ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.Migration

    • getQuery

      public abstract org.neo4j.driver.Query getQuery()
      The statement returned by this method should have exactly one Java format specifier %s which will be used by us to insert the result of csvSource. Any other parameters included with the query object will just be used as is.
      Returns:
      The Cypher statement to be used to load the CSV file.

    • customizeRequest

      public HttpRequest customizeRequest(HttpRequest.Builder builder)
      Overwrite this method and apply all customization to the builder that you might need, such as authentication, additional headers and cookies. Everybody loves cookies.
      Parameters:
      builder - Pre-initialized with the target source
      Returns:
      The usable request
